title: Java Level 5 â€” Patterns & Advanced Loops
concept: Nested loops, simple patterns, and slightly more complex string logic.

challenges.title: Sum of Digits
challenges.description: Given a non-negative integer n, compute the sum of its digits.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum of digits of n.

challenges.title: Count Words
challenges.description: Given a line of text containing words separated by spaces, count how many words are present. Assume no leading/trailing spaces and words are separated by a single space.

challenges.title: Rectangle Pattern
challenges.description: Given two integers n and m, print a solid rectangle of n rows and m columns using '*'.
challenges.inputDescription: Two integers n and m separated by space.
challenges.outputDescription: n lines, each with m '*' characters (no spaces).

challenges.title: Right Triangle Pattern
challenges.description: Given n, print a right-angled triangle pattern of '*' of height n. On the i-th line there should be i stars.
challenges.outputDescription: n lines of increasing '*' from 1 to n.

challenges.title: Sum Until Zero
challenges.description: Read integers one by one until you read 0. Print the sum of all numbers read excluding the final 0.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum of all non-zero values.

challenges.title: First Uppercase
challenges.description: Given a string S, find and print the first uppercase English letter in it. If there is no uppercase letter, print -1.

challenges.title: Character Frequency
challenges.description: Given a lowercase string S and a character c, print how many times c appears in S.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: S. Second line: c (single character).

challenges.title: GCD of Two Numbers
challenges.description: Given two integers a and b, compute their greatest common divisor (GCD) using any loop-based method.

challenges.title: LCM of Two Numbers
challenges.description: Given two positive integers a and b, print their least common multiple (LCM).

challenges.title: Binary Representation (Loop)
challenges.description: Given a non-negative integer n, print its binary representation without leading zeros.
